admin/editor.modal.title: Modal Component
admin/editor.modal.description: A component that allows to display other blocks inside it as a modal.
admin/editor.modal.centered.title: Centered
admin/editor.modal.centered.description: Set to true if component should be centered on screen
admin/editor.modal.closeOnEsc.title: Close on Esc
admin/editor.modal.closeOnEsc.descriptio: Set to true if modal should close when esc key is pressed
admin/editor.modal.closeOnOverlayClick.d: Set to true if modal should close when pressing on outside area
admin/editor.modal.showCloseIcon.title: Show close icon
admin/editor.modal.showCloseIcon.descrip: Set to true if modal should display close icon
admin/editor.modal.buttonLabel.title: Button Label
admin/editor.modal.buttonLabel.descripti: Set the label displayed on button to open modal
admin/editor.modal.buttonClass.title: Button class
admin/editor.modal.buttonClass.descripti: Pass extra tachyon classes to button container
admin/editor.modal.blockClass.title: Block class
admin/editor.modal.blockClass.descriptio: Unique class name to be appended to block classes
